content:
GREENSBORO  The mens basketball team has been picked to finish third in the ACC preseason poll of conference media the highest such pick for the team in five years PERIOD

North Carolina coach Roy Williams said he expects N.C PERIOD State to be a formidable team as long as its new point guard can fill in well after the loss of Engin Atsur PERIOD

Redshirt sophomore Farnold Degand is the most likely candidate to be the starting point guard in the season opener with Javier Gonzalez injured and Marques Johnson not eligible until the end of the first semester PERIOD

 Williams said PERIOD 

But even with the heightened expectations after the team was picked last a season ago coach Sidney Lowe wont be changing how he coaches PERIOD

 Lowe said PERIOD 

Meanwhile senior forward Gavin Grant said the biggest difference in the team is its certainty in its ability compared to last years group PERIOD

 Grant said PERIOD 

The team will feature seven new players including five freshmen PERIOD Among them is McDonalds AllAmerican J.J PERIOD Hickson who finished second in the voting for preseason ACC Rookie of the Year PERIOD

Junior forward Ben McCauley said he is impressed with Hicksons work ethic in practice PERIOD

 McCauley said PERIOD 

McCauley added that it will be nice to have more players who can play minutes for the team as opposed to last year when the team often went only six deep PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

But while he is expecting the freshmen to add needed depth to the team he said he doesnt expect them to unseat any of the teams four returning starters junior guard Courtney Fells Grant redshirt sophomore forward Brandon Costner and McCauley PERIOD

 McCauley said PERIOD 

 ACC Basketball Preseason Media PollTeam firstplace votes Total pointsNorth Carolina  768Duke 653N.C PERIOD State 641Clemson 514Virginia 492Maryland 447Georgia Tech 389Boston College 332Florida State 284Virginia Tech 162Wake Forest 157Miami 153Source ACC Media
